Description: The number of trees in the forest.
The maximum depth of the trees in the forest.
The minimum number of samples required to split a node in the tree.
The minimum number of samples required to be at a leaf node.
The number of features to consider when looking for the best split.
The function to measure the quality of a split.
Whether to bootstrap the samples when building the trees.
Whether to calculate an out-of-bag score.
